changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, base_table.id, base_table.name, s.name AS service, p.name AS product, r.name AS requester, dt.name AS deliver_to, df.name AS deliver_from, assign.name AS assign_to, base_table.quantity, u.name AS quantity_unit, cs.name AS child_service, cp.name AS child_product, cat.name AS child_assign_to, base_table.child_quantity, cqu.name AS child_quantity_unit, cdt.name AS child_deliver_to, cdf.name AS child_deliver_from, base_table.sequence_number, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM protocol base_table JOIN existential s ON base_table.service = s.id JOIN existential p ON base_table.product = p.id JOIN existential r ON base_table.requester = r.id JOIN existential dt ON base_table.deliver_to = dt.id JOIN existential df ON base_table.deliver_from = df.id JOIN existential assign ON base_table.assign_to = assign.id JOIN existential u ON base_table.quantity_unit = u.id JOIN existential cqu ON base_table.child_quantity_unit = cqu.id JOIN existential cs ON base_table.child_service = cs.id JOIN existential cp ON base_table.child_product = cp.id JOIN existential cat ON base_table.child_assign_to = cat.id JOIN existential cdt ON base_table.child_deliver_to = cdt.id JOIN existential cdf ON base_table.child_deliver_from = cdf.id JOIN existential up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
